qa_list.question: What is the first step in cooking Machboos according to the recipe?
qa_list.answer: Heat vegetable oil in a deep frying pan and cook onions and garlic until golden.

(cid:145)(cid:210)(cid:106)(cid:214)(cid:207)(cid:64) (cid:46) (cid:73)(cid:46) (cid:28)(cid:10)(cid:75)(cid:46) How do I cook Machboos? Here is an easy and delicious chicken Machboos recipe you can try: heat vegetable oil in a deep frying cook onions and garlic until they are gold. Add the chicken pieces and continue cooking until they turn golden brown. The mixture is seasoned with salt and fresh ground black pepper according to taste and leave it aside for processing. To make the sauce, mix tomato sauce, ground coriander, laurel leaf, cinnamon, cloves, star anise, chicken stock cube into a bowl and add enough water to make a thick paste. Put the pre-washed and soaked rice in a strainer to strain the excess water and then put it in the deep pot. pour enough chicken stock over rice to cover it completely by about 2 cm. lightly sprinkled salt on rice and put it on high fire. When the mixture boils, lower the heat to medium and let the rice be cooked for another 15 minutes until ripe. After finishing cooking the rice, heat the sauce again and mix it well to ensure the cube melts completely. Then add the mixture to the cooked chicken, onions and garlic and stir it well to ensure that the ingredients are mixed together. Let them cook for a few extra minutes until the sauce gets a little thick and the spices, chicken and rice taste imbibed. Served the Machboos hot and decorated with chopped coriander, parsley, roasted almonds, and raisins. (cid:189)(cid:75)(cid:46) To submit an application for an Emirati ID, you will need to visit the official UAE government website and provide some of your personal information and passport details. You will need to provide a passport-sized photograph and a scan of your current passport and any necessary sup- porting documents. Once your application is submitted, your details will be reviewed by the UAE authorities and you will receive your Emirati ID card either by express mail or in person. Make sure you keep your card with you all the time and follow the guidelines

qa_list.question: What should be added to the chicken pieces in the Machboos recipe after they turn golden brown?
qa_list.answer: The mixture should be seasoned with salt and fresh ground black pepper according to taste.

(cid:145)(cid:210)(cid:106)(cid:214)(cid:207)(cid:64) (cid:46) (cid:73)(cid:46) (cid:28)(cid:10)(cid:75)(cid:46) How do I cook Machboos? Here is an easy and delicious chicken Machboos recipe you can try: heat vegetable oil in a deep frying cook onions and garlic until they are gold. Add the chicken pieces and continue cooking until they turn golden brown. The mixture is seasoned with salt and fresh ground black pepper according to taste and leave it aside for processing. To make the sauce, mix tomato sauce, ground coriander, laurel leaf, cinnamon, cloves, star anise, chicken stock cube into a bowl and add enough water to make a thick paste. Put the pre-washed and soaked rice in a strainer to strain the excess water and then put it in the deep pot. pour enough chicken stock over rice to cover it completely by about 2 cm. lightly sprinkled salt on rice and put it on high fire. When the mixture boils, lower the heat to medium and let the rice be cooked for another 15 minutes until ripe. After finishing cooking the rice, heat the sauce again and mix it well to ensure the cube melts completely. Then add the mixture to the cooked chicken, onions and garlic and stir it well to ensure that the ingredients are mixed together. Let them cook for a few extra minutes until the sauce gets a little thick and the spices, chicken and rice taste imbibed. Served the Machboos hot and decorated with chopped coriander, parsley, roasted almonds, and raisins. (cid:189)(cid:75)(cid:46) To submit an application for an Emirati ID, you will need to visit the official UAE government website and provide some of your personal information and passport details. You will need to provide a passport-sized photograph and a scan of your current passport and any necessary sup- porting documents. Once your application is submitted, your details will be reviewed by the UAE authorities and you will receive your Emirati ID card either by express mail or in person. Make sure you keep your card with you all the time and follow the guidelines

qa_list.question: How is the sauce made in the Machboos recipe?
qa_list.answer: Mix tomato sauce, ground coriander, laurel leaf, cinnamon, cloves, star anise, and chicken stock cube into a bowl and add enough water to make a thick paste.

(cid:145)(cid:210)(cid:106)(cid:214)(cid:207)(cid:64) (cid:46) (cid:73)(cid:46) (cid:28)(cid:10)(cid:75)(cid:46) How do I cook Machboos? Here is an easy and delicious chicken Machboos recipe you can try: heat vegetable oil in a deep frying cook onions and garlic until they are gold. Add the chicken pieces and continue cooking until they turn golden brown. The mixture is seasoned with salt and fresh ground black pepper according to taste and leave it aside for processing. To make the sauce, mix tomato sauce, ground coriander, laurel leaf, cinnamon, cloves, star anise, chicken stock cube into a bowl and add enough water to make a thick paste. Put the pre-washed and soaked rice in a strainer to strain the excess water and then put it in the deep pot. pour enough chicken stock over rice to cover it completely by about 2 cm. lightly sprinkled salt on rice and put it on high fire. When the mixture boils, lower the heat to medium and let the rice be cooked for another 15 minutes until ripe. After finishing cooking the rice, heat the sauce again and mix it well to ensure the cube melts completely. Then add the mixture to the cooked chicken, onions and garlic and stir it well to ensure that the ingredients are mixed together. Let them cook for a few extra minutes until the sauce gets a little thick and the spices, chicken and rice taste imbibed. Served the Machboos hot and decorated with chopped coriander, parsley, roasted almonds, and raisins. (cid:189)(cid:75)(cid:46) To submit an application for an Emirati ID, you will need to visit the official UAE government website and provide some of your personal information and passport details. You will need to provide a passport-sized photograph and a scan of your current passport and any necessary sup- porting documents. Once your application is submitted, your details will be reviewed by the UAE authorities and you will receive your Emirati ID card either by express mail or in person. Make sure you keep your card with you all the time and follow the guidelines

qa_list.question: How is the rice prepared in the Machboos recipe?
qa_list.answer: The pre-washed and soaked rice is put in a strainer to strain excess water, then placed in a deep pot. Enough chicken stock is poured over the rice to cover it completely by about 2 cm.

(cid:145)(cid:210)(cid:106)(cid:214)(cid:207)(cid:64) (cid:46) (cid:73)(cid:46) (cid:28)(cid:10)(cid:75)(cid:46) How do I cook Machboos? Here is an easy and delicious chicken Machboos recipe you can try: heat vegetable oil in a deep frying cook onions and garlic until they are gold. Add the chicken pieces and continue cooking until they turn golden brown. The mixture is seasoned with salt and fresh ground black pepper according to taste and leave it aside for processing. To make the sauce, mix tomato sauce, ground coriander, laurel leaf, cinnamon, cloves, star anise, chicken stock cube into a bowl and add enough water to make a thick paste. Put the pre-washed and soaked rice in a strainer to strain the excess water and then put it in the deep pot. pour enough chicken stock over rice to cover it completely by about 2 cm. lightly sprinkled salt on rice and put it on high fire. When the mixture boils, lower the heat to medium and let the rice be cooked for another 15 minutes until ripe. After finishing cooking the rice, heat the sauce again and mix it well to ensure the cube melts completely. Then add the mixture to the cooked chicken, onions and garlic and stir it well to ensure that the ingredients are mixed together. Let them cook for a few extra minutes until the sauce gets a little thick and the spices, chicken and rice taste imbibed. Served the Machboos hot and decorated with chopped coriander, parsley, roasted almonds, and raisins. (cid:189)(cid:75)(cid:46) To submit an application for an Emirati ID, you will need to visit the official UAE government website and provide some of your personal information and passport details. You will need to provide a passport-sized photograph and a scan of your current passport and any necessary sup- porting documents. Once your application is submitted, your details will be reviewed by the UAE authorities and you will receive your Emirati ID card either by express mail or in person. Make sure you keep your card with you all the time and follow the guidelines

qa_list.question: What should you do after the rice boils in the Machboos recipe?
qa_list.answer: Lower the heat to medium and let the rice cook for another 15 minutes until ripe.

(cid:145)(cid:210)(cid:106)(cid:214)(cid:207)(cid:64) (cid:46) (cid:73)(cid:46) (cid:28)(cid:10)(cid:75)(cid:46) How do I cook Machboos? Here is an easy and delicious chicken Machboos recipe you can try: heat vegetable oil in a deep frying cook onions and garlic until they are gold. Add the chicken pieces and continue cooking until they turn golden brown. The mixture is seasoned with salt and fresh ground black pepper according to taste and leave it aside for processing. To make the sauce, mix tomato sauce, ground coriander, laurel leaf, cinnamon, cloves, star anise, chicken stock cube into a bowl and add enough water to make a thick paste. Put the pre-washed and soaked rice in a strainer to strain the excess water and then put it in the deep pot. pour enough chicken stock over rice to cover it completely by about 2 cm. lightly sprinkled salt on rice and put it on high fire. When the mixture boils, lower the heat to medium and let the rice be cooked for another 15 minutes until ripe. After finishing cooking the rice, heat the sauce again and mix it well to ensure the cube melts completely. Then add the mixture to the cooked chicken, onions and garlic and stir it well to ensure that the ingredients are mixed together. Let them cook for a few extra minutes until the sauce gets a little thick and the spices, chicken and rice taste imbibed. Served the Machboos hot and decorated with chopped coriander, parsley, roasted almonds, and raisins. (cid:189)(cid:75)(cid:46) To submit an application for an Emirati ID, you will need to visit the official UAE government website and provide some of your personal information and passport details. You will need to provide a passport-sized photograph and a scan of your current passport and any necessary sup- porting documents. Once your application is submitted, your details will be reviewed by the UAE authorities and you will receive your Emirati ID card either by express mail or in person. Make sure you keep your card with you all the time and follow the guidelines

qa_list.question: How should the sauce be added to the cooked chicken, onions, and garlic in the Machboos recipe?
qa_list.answer: Stir the sauce well to ensure the cube melts completely, then add it to the cooked chicken, onions, and garlic and stir to mix the ingredients.

(cid:145)(cid:210)(cid:106)(cid:214)(cid:207)(cid:64) (cid:46) (cid:73)(cid:46) (cid:28)(cid:10)(cid:75)(cid:46) How do I cook Machboos? Here is an easy and delicious chicken Machboos recipe you can try: heat vegetable oil in a deep frying cook onions and garlic until they are gold. Add the chicken pieces and continue cooking until they turn golden brown. The mixture is seasoned with salt and fresh ground black pepper according to taste and leave it aside for processing. To make the sauce, mix tomato sauce, ground coriander, laurel leaf, cinnamon, cloves, star anise, chicken stock cube into a bowl and add enough water to make a thick paste. Put the pre-washed and soaked rice in a strainer to strain the excess water and then put it in the deep pot. pour enough chicken stock over rice to cover it completely by about 2 cm. lightly sprinkled salt on rice and put it on high fire. When the mixture boils, lower the heat to medium and let the rice be cooked for another 15 minutes until ripe. After finishing cooking the rice, heat the sauce again and mix it well to ensure the cube melts completely. Then add the mixture to the cooked chicken, onions and garlic and stir it well to ensure that the ingredients are mixed together. Let them cook for a few extra minutes until the sauce gets a little thick and the spices, chicken and rice taste imbibed. Served the Machboos hot and decorated with chopped coriander, parsley, roasted almonds, and raisins. (cid:189)(cid:75)(cid:46) To submit an application for an Emirati ID, you will need to visit the official UAE government website and provide some of your personal information and passport details. You will need to provide a passport-sized photograph and a scan of your current passport and any necessary sup- porting documents. Once your application is submitted, your details will be reviewed by the UAE authorities and you will receive your Emirati ID card either by express mail or in person. Make sure you keep your card with you all the time and follow the guidelines

qa_list.question: What should be added to the Machboos before serving it?
qa_list.answer: Chopped coriander, parsley, roasted almonds, and raisins.

(cid:145)(cid:210)(cid:106)(cid:214)(cid:207)(cid:64) (cid:46) (cid:73)(cid:46) (cid:28)(cid:10)(cid:75)(cid:46) How do I cook Machboos? Here is an easy and delicious chicken Machboos recipe you can try: heat vegetable oil in a deep frying cook onions and garlic until they are gold. Add the chicken pieces and continue cooking until they turn golden brown. The mixture is seasoned with salt and fresh ground black pepper according to taste and leave it aside for processing. To make the sauce, mix tomato sauce, ground coriander, laurel leaf, cinnamon, cloves, star anise, chicken stock cube into a bowl and add enough water to make a thick paste. Put the pre-washed and soaked rice in a strainer to strain the excess water and then put it in the deep pot. pour enough chicken stock over rice to cover it completely by about 2 cm. lightly sprinkled salt on rice and put it on high fire. When the mixture boils, lower the heat to medium and let the rice be cooked for another 15 minutes until ripe. After finishing cooking the rice, heat the sauce again and mix it well to ensure the cube melts completely. Then add the mixture to the cooked chicken, onions and garlic and stir it well to ensure that the ingredients are mixed together. Let them cook for a few extra minutes until the sauce gets a little thick and the spices, chicken and rice taste imbibed. Served the Machboos hot and decorated with chopped coriander, parsley, roasted almonds, and raisins. (cid:189)(cid:75)(cid:46) To submit an application for an Emirati ID, you will need to visit the official UAE government website and provide some of your personal information and passport details. You will need to provide a passport-sized photograph and a scan of your current passport and any necessary sup- porting documents. Once your application is submitted, your details will be reviewed by the UAE authorities and you will receive your Emirati ID card either by express mail or in person. Make sure you keep your card with you all the time and follow the guidelines

qa_list.question: How can one apply for an Emirates ID?
qa_list.answer: Visit the official UAE government website, provide personal information and passport details, along with a passport-sized photograph and scan of the current passport and necessary supporting documents.

(cid:145)(cid:210)(cid:106)(cid:214)(cid:207)(cid:64) (cid:46) (cid:73)(cid:46) (cid:28)(cid:10)(cid:75)(cid:46) How do I cook Machboos? Here is an easy and delicious chicken Machboos recipe you can try: heat vegetable oil in a deep frying cook onions and garlic until they are gold. Add the chicken pieces and continue cooking until they turn golden brown. The mixture is seasoned with salt and fresh ground black pepper according to taste and leave it aside for processing. To make the sauce, mix tomato sauce, ground coriander, laurel leaf, cinnamon, cloves, star anise, chicken stock cube into a bowl and add enough water to make a thick paste. Put the pre-washed and soaked rice in a strainer to strain the excess water and then put it in the deep pot. pour enough chicken stock over rice to cover it completely by about 2 cm. lightly sprinkled salt on rice and put it on high fire. When the mixture boils, lower the heat to medium and let the rice be cooked for another 15 minutes until ripe. After finishing cooking the rice, heat the sauce again and mix it well to ensure the cube melts completely. Then add the mixture to the cooked chicken, onions and garlic and stir it well to ensure that the ingredients are mixed together. Let them cook for a few extra minutes until the sauce gets a little thick and the spices, chicken and rice taste imbibed. Served the Machboos hot and decorated with chopped coriander, parsley, roasted almonds, and raisins. (cid:189)(cid:75)(cid:46) To submit an application for an Emirati ID, you will need to visit the official UAE government website and provide some of your personal information and passport details. You will need to provide a passport-sized photograph and a scan of your current passport and any necessary sup- porting documents. Once your application is submitted, your details will be reviewed by the UAE authorities and you will receive your Emirati ID card either by express mail or in person. Make sure you keep your card with you all the time and follow the guidelines

qa_list.question: What happens after submitting the application for an Emirates ID?
qa_list.answer: The details will be reviewed by UAE authorities and the Emirati ID card will be received either by express mail or in person.

Here is an easy and delicious chicken Machboos recipe you can try: heat vegetable oil in a deep frying cook onions and garlic until they are gold. Add the chicken pieces and continue cooking until they turn golden brown. The mixture is seasoned with salt and fresh ground black pepper according to taste and leave it aside for processing. To make the sauce, mix tomato sauce, ground coriander, laurel leaf, cinnamon, cloves, star anise, chicken stock cube into a bowl and add enough water to make a thick paste. Put the pre-washed and soaked rice in a strainer to strain the excess water and then put it in the deep pot. pour enough chicken stock over rice to cover it completely by about 2 cm. lightly sprinkled salt on rice and put it on high fire. When the mixture boils, lower the heat to medium and let the rice be cooked for another 15 minutes until ripe. After finishing cooking the rice, heat the sauce again and mix it well to ensure the cube melts completely. Then add the mixture to the cooked chicken, onions and garlic and stir it well to ensure that the ingredients are mixed together. Let them cook for a few extra minutes until the sauce gets a little thick and the spices, chicken and rice taste imbibed. Served the Machboos hot and decorated with chopped coriander, parsley, roasted almonds, and raisins. (cid:189)(cid:75)(cid:46) To submit an application for an Emirati ID, you will need to visit the official UAE government website and provide some of your personal information and passport details. You will need to provide a passport-sized photograph and a scan of your current passport and any necessary sup- porting documents. Once your application is submitted, your details will be reviewed by the UAE authorities and you will receive your Emirati ID card either by express mail or in person. Make sure you keep your card with you all the time and follow the guidelines

qa_list.question: What is the final instruction for using the Emirates ID card?
qa_list.answer: Keep the card with you at all times and follow the guidelines.

(cid:145)(cid:210)(cid:106)(cid:214)(cid:207)(cid:64) (cid:46) (cid:73)(cid:46) (cid:28)(cid:10)(cid:75)(cid:46) How do I cook Machboos? Here is an easy and delicious chicken Machboos recipe you can try: heat vegetable oil in a deep frying cook onions and garlic until they are gold. Add the chicken pieces and continue cooking until they turn golden brown. The mixture is seasoned with salt and fresh ground black pepper according to taste and leave it aside for processing. To make the sauce, mix tomato sauce, ground coriander, laurel leaf, cinnamon, cloves, star anise, chicken stock cube into a bowl and add enough water to make a thick paste. Put the pre-washed and soaked rice in a strainer to strain the excess water and then put it in the deep pot. pour enough chicken stock over rice to cover it completely by about 2 cm. lightly sprinkled salt on rice and put it on high fire. When the mixture boils, lower the heat to medium and let the rice be cooked for another 15 minutes until ripe. After finishing cooking the rice, heat the sauce again and mix it well to ensure the cube melts completely. Then add the mixture to the cooked chicken, onions and garlic and stir it well to ensure that the ingredients are mixed together. Let them cook for a few extra minutes until the sauce gets a little thick and the spices, chicken and rice taste imbibed. Served the Machboos hot and decorated with chopped coriander, parsley, roasted almonds, and raisins. (cid:189)(cid:75)(cid:46) To submit an application for an Emirati ID, you will need to visit the official UAE government website and provide some of your personal information and passport details. You will need to provide a passport-sized photograph and a scan of your current passport and any necessary sup- porting documents. Once your application is submitted, your details will be reviewed by the UAE authorities and you will receive your Emirati ID card either by express mail or in person. Make sure you keep your card with you all the time and follow the guidelines

(cid:145)(cid:210)(cid:106)(cid:214)(cid:207)(cid:64) (cid:46) (cid:73)(cid:46) (cid:28)(cid:10)(cid:75)(cid:46) How do I cook Machboos? Here is an easy and delicious chicken Machboos recipe you can try: heat vegetable oil in a deep frying cook onions and garlic until they are gold. Add the chicken pieces and continue cooking until they turn golden brown. The mixture is seasoned with salt and fresh ground black pepper according to taste and leave it aside for processing. To make the sauce, mix tomato sauce, ground coriander, laurel leaf, cinnamon, cloves, star anise, chicken stock cube into a bowl and add enough water to make a thick paste. Put the pre-washed and soaked rice in a strainer to strain the excess water and then put it in the deep pot. pour enough chicken stock over rice to cover it completely by about 2 cm. lightly sprinkled salt on rice and put it on high fire. When the mixture boils, lower the heat to medium and let the rice be cooked for another 15 minutes until ripe. After finishing cooking the rice, heat the sauce again and mix it well to ensure the cube melts completely. Then add the mixture to the cooked chicken, onions and garlic and stir it well to ensure that the ingredients are mixed together. Let them cook for a few extra minutes until the sauce gets a little thick and the spices, chicken and rice taste imbibed. Served the Machboos hot and decorated with chopped coriander, parsley, roasted almonds, and raisins. You will need to provide a passport-sized photograph and a scan of your current passport and any necessary sup- porting documents. Once your application is submitted, your details will be reviewed by the UAE authorities and you will receive your Emirati ID card either by express mail or in person. Make sure you keep your card with you all the time and follow the guidelines
